content: Alessandro Margara Alessandro Margara Home Publications Teaching Service Software Contacts Alessandro Margara Associate Professor Politecnico di Milano Room: 33 Building: 22 Via Golgi 42 20133 Milano Italy Mail: alessandro.margara@polimi.it Phone: +39 02 2399 3483 Web: https://margara.faculty.polimi.it Twitter: @alemargara83 Short Bio I am an associate professor at Politecnico di Milano. I obtained my PhD Politecnico di Milano in 2012. I worked as a post-doctoral researcher in the High Performance Distributed Computing group, at the Vrije Universiteit Amsterdam between 2012 and 2014, and in the STAR research group at Universit√† della Svizzera Italiana (USI, University of Lugano) between 2014 and 2016. I have been a visiting research scholar at the Purdue University in 2011. My research lab develops new solutions to ease the development of complex distributed software systems, targeting data-intensive applications in particular. My research intersects software engineering and distributed systems, proposing novel programming abstractions and implementing them into concrete systems.
